text: You have killed my love_ You used to stir my imagination. Now you don t even stir my curiosity. You simply produce no effect. I loved you because yOu were marvellous because you had genius and intellect, because you realised the dreams of great poets and gave shape and substance to the shadows of art_ You have thrown it all away. You are shallow and stupid.
